Software Developer Lumeris healthcare St Louis MO April 2018 to Present Worked on Lumeris data services platform by analyzing business requirements technical designing implementation and documentation using Agile Methodologies Involved in developing applications with REST web services and experienced with securing the rest web services Migrated core applications from tomcat 7 to tomcat 8524 under concurrent futures library Worked on creating AWS resources Lambda RDS through cloud formation templates Worked on JUnit tests for the API using Mockito Created and Consumed Restful Web Services using Spring boot New library development with micro services architecture using Rest APIs spring boot Enhancement of the existing functionality to persist the messages to Cassandra DB in Kafka Implemented
